name: January 1, 2015
event: Bloodborne wins the 'Most Anticipated Game' award at the PlayStation Awards in Japan.

name: January 2, 2016
event: FromSoftware announces development of a new IP during a financial report, later revealed as Elden Ring.

name: January 3, 2019
event: The Dark Souls series surpasses 25 million units sold worldwide.

name: January 4, 2020
event: The first 'Return to Yharnam' community event of the year begins, encouraging players to revisit Bloodborne.

name: January 5, 2017
event: Dark Souls III wins 'Best RPG' at the D.I.C.E. Awards.

name: January 6, 2018
event: Dark Souls Remastered is officially announced, teasing an improved experience for returning players.

name: January 7, 2021
event: Elden Ring wins the 'Most Anticipated Game' award at The Game Awards for the second consecutive year.

name: January 8, 2015
event: The Bloodborne alpha test concludes, incorporating valuable player feedback into final polishing.

name: January 9, 2014
event: Dark Souls II's 'Crown of the Sunken King' DLC teaser is released, sparking community theories about its lore.

name: January 10, 2016
event: The opening cinematic for Dark Souls III is revealed, setting the tone for the upcoming release.

name: January 11, 2019
event: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice wins 'Game of the Year' at the New York Game Awards.

name: January 12, 2015
event: Bloodborne's official soundtrack is announced, composed by Tsukasa Saitoh and Yuka Kitamura.

name: January 13, 2017
event: Dark Souls III's 'The Ringed City' DLC is officially revealed as the final chapter in the series.

event: Miyazaki confirms Elden Ring development is progressing smoothly during an interview.

event: Dark Souls III's network test is announced, with players invited to stress-test servers.

event: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice's story trailer is released, offering insight into its narrative themes.

event: Bloodborne's Chalice Dungeon feature is highlighted, showcasing procedurally generated areas.

event: Elden Ring's release date is announced for February 25, 2022.

event: Dark Souls III collector's edition is revealed, including a Red Knight statue and art book.

event: Elden Ring's closed network test begins, offering players an early look at its vast world.

event: Gameplay footage of Dark Souls Remastered is showcased, highlighting visual and performance upgrades.

event: Bloodborne surpasses 3 million copies sold globally.

event: Elden Ring's community begins organizing cosplay showcase events.

event: Dark Souls III: Ashes of Ariandel DLC achieves record sales upon release.

event: Elden Ring teaser reveals cooperative multiplayer gameplay.
